alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 05 at 10:11AM EDT until June 06 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Alafia River At Lithia affecting Hillsborough County. For the Alafia...including Lithia ...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alafia River at Lithia . * WHEN...From Tuesday morning to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, River Drive and Squirrel Run Way downstream of County Road 640 are completely covered by water. One home begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EDT Monday the stage was 11.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 13.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 13.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.0 feet on 07/21/1959. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 am EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Alafia River Lithia 13.0 11.5 Mon 9 am 13.0 12.4 10.9 8.9 7.2 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 115 AM EDT.
